name: Sea Peoples
declaringWar: We come from the midst of the sea and none are able to withstand us.
attacked: Your attack on us will be your death
introduction: The Sea Peoples were a seafaring confederation that attacked ancient Egypt and other regions in the East Mediterranean before and during the Late Bronze Age collapse (1200–900 BC). The Sea Peoples' incursions became one of the most famous chapters of Egyptian history.
neutralHello: We sail the mighty seas looking for new nations to plunder.
hateHello: The seas are ours! Stay out of the waters.

name: Minoan Empire
declaringWar: By our strength, we will  verthrow thy seed
attacked: You have shed our blood. Now we will shed yours!
defeated: Your power is superior to ours
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Culture] buildings [in all cities]
Enables [Scout] units to enter ocean tiles
Free Great Person <upon discovering a Natural Wonder>

name: Lycia
declaringWar: No land can stand before our arms
attacked: An eye dor an eye. Now you die!
defeated: We lay our swords at your feet.
neutralHello: We greet you in the name of peace.
hateHello: We are much more cultured than you.
uniques: [+1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [unimproved] [Hill] tiles>
May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [enhancing] a religion

name: Akkadia
declaringWar: We will tear out thy foundations and destroy thy progeny
attacked: You dare besiege us! We will go forth to battle and defeat you!
defeated: We bow to thee who has destroyed our vast army.
neutralHello: Our greatness will not compare with you but welcome.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit
[+20]% Production when constructing [Melee] units [in all cities]
New [Melee] units start with [10] Experience [in all cities]

name: Elam
declaringWar: Elam takes up the quiver, with her charioteers and horses - Isaiah 22:6
attacked: You dare besiege us! We will go forth to battle and defeat you!
defeated: We surrender now but know this: 'I will restore the fortunes of Elam in days to come, declares the Lord' - Jeremiah 49:39
introduction:
Elam was an ancient civilization centered in the far west and southwest of modern-day Iran. Elam traded extensively with the Indus Valley civilization.
In the Old Testament, Elam is described as a land of archers.
neutralHello: Our greatness will not compare with you but welcome.
uniques: [+20]% Gold from Great Merchant trade missions
